kv12.4:1.3: Sukhavedaniyaṃ dukkhavedaniyaṃ …pe… sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:1.5: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:1.7: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.4:2.4: Cakkhāyatanaṃ vipāko, cakkhāyatanaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:3.1: ☑ Cakkhāyatanaṃ vipāko, cakkhāyatanaṃ na sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.6: Sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.8: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.10: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.4:5.4: Kāyāyatanaṃ vipāko, kāyāyatanaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:5.6: kāyāyatanaṃ vipāko, kāyāyatanaṃ na sukhavedaniyaṃ …pe… anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:6.6: Hañci saḷāyatanaṃ kammassa katattā uppannaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
